segments.text: Hello , Mr . Clark . You ’ re early for lunch . It ’ s only eleven o ’ clock .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When I come late , there ’ s usually nothing left .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ ll have the leg of lamb .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And would you like salad ? The salad plate today is lettuce , tomatoes , and black olives .
segments.speaker: S2
